metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2485 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 14.1 before 15.10.8, all versions starting from 15.11 before15.11.7, all versions starting from 16.0 before 16.0.2. A maliciousmaintainer in a project can escalate other users to Owners in that projectif they import members from another project that those other users areOwners of.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
